[c/00ff80:'Back']
[c/008762:Card 1 out of 8]
[c/7f7f7f:-------]
Wether very close or very far,
the [c/ffff00:Back] type can
always give great depth to
your builds.

[c/00ff80:'Slidey']
[c/008762:Card #2 out of 8]
[c/7f7f7f:-------]
Slippery and sometimes
sloped, the [c/ffff00:Slidey] type
brings a great challenge
to many areas.

[c/00ff80:'Solid']
[c/008762:Card #3 out of 8]
[c/7f7f7f:-------]
Incredibly simple, yet
incredibly versitle.
The [c/ffff00:Solid] type makes
the foundation of Infinity.

[c/00ff80:'Thing']
[c/008762:Card #4 out of 8]
[c/7f7f7f:-------]
Miscellaneous yet specific,
the [c/ffff00:Thing] type covers a
wide variety of uses, be that a sign,
a highlight, or even...a furry?

[c/00ff80:'Climbable']
[c/008762:Card #5 out of 8]
[c/7f7f7f:-------]
From slow to fast, whatever
form it takes, the [c/ffff00:Climbable]
type allows anyone to reach
for the skies.

[c/00ff80:'Dynamic']
[c/008762:Card #6 out of 8]
[c/7f7f7f:-------]
It could be an animation,
a pet, weapon, anything,
really. The [c/ffff00:Dynamic type]
is one of the most powerful.

[c/00ff80:'Interacting']
[c/008762:Card #7 out of 8]
[c/7f7f7f:-------]
Even the simplest understanding
of its language allows you a
glimpse into the true power of
the [c/ffff00:Interacting] type.

[c/00ff80:'Automation']
[c/008762:Card #8 out of 8]
[c/7f7f7f:-------]
Tapping into the very DNA of
Infinity, the [c/ffff00:Automation] types
allow you to meld and warp the
very fabric of reality.
